column4: I recently installed Ubuntu for the first time on an old computer (clean instal on a formatted HD).  I just noticed that some websites don't open and it says that it's looking up for 7search.com and also, some software freezes and is not responding.  Am thinking that I have some spyware, anyone know how to clean/fix this?
is it possible your router is compromised? what kinds of websites don't work, do you have any examples?
I tried going on kijiji.ca (similar to craigslist) and some sites on it don't work, not sure which other sites dont work, but it's on and off
can you pastebin the contents of /etc/resolv.conf please? along with the output of "ifconfig -a"
